borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Drawing title:&nbsp;Proposed ground floor plan - Drawing No:&nbsp;</span>P-GFP1 REV A - Dated: 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed first floor plan - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-FFP1 REV A - Dated: 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed roof plan - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-RP1 REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed section AA - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-SEC1 REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed front elevation - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-FE1&nbsp;REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed rear elevation - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-RE1&nbsp;REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed west side elevation - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-SE1&nbsp;REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed east side elevation - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-SE2 REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed front elevation - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-FE1 REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed rear elevation - Drawing No:&nbsp;P-RE1 REV A - Dated 12.12.2022</span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a rear infill extension
